mapper.insert: insert into question (no, movie_no, theater_no, start_time, end_time) values ( seq_scheduel_no.nextval, #{movieNo}, #{theaterNo}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, )
mapper.update: update schedule set movie_no = #{movieNo}, theater_no = #{theaterNo}, start_titme = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}
